      • decomposeRangeFully

        public RangeDecomposition decomposeRangeFully(MultiDimensionalNumericData query)
        Description copied from interface: GridIndex
        Returns a collection of ranges on the 1-d space filling curve that correspond to the n-dimensional range described in the query parameter.

        This method will decompose the range all the way down to the unit interval of 1.

        Specified by:
        decomposeRangeFully in interface GridIndex
        Parameters:
        query - describes the n-dimensional query window that will be decomposed
        Returns:
        an object containing the ranges on the DGGS that overlap the parameters supplied in the query object

      • decomposeRange

        public RangeDecomposition decomposeRange(MultiDimensionalNumericData query,
                                         boolean overInclusiveOnEdge,
                                         int maxRanges)
        Description copied from interface: GridIndex
        Returns a collection of ranges on the 1-d space filling curve that correspond to the n-dimensional range described in the query parameter.

        This method will roll up the ranges based on the maxRanges parameter. Ranges will be "connected" based on the minimization of distance between the end of one range and the start of the next.

        Specified by:
        decomposeRange in interface GridIndex
        Parameters:
        query - describes the n-dimensional query window that will be decomposed
        Returns:
        an object containing the ranges on the DGGS that overlap the parameters supplied in the query object

        Description copied from interface: GridIndex

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • normalizeRange

        public long[] normalizeRange(double minValue,
                             double maxValue,
                             int dimension)
        Description copied from interface: GridIndex
        Determines the coordinates within this DGGS for a dimension given a range
        Specified by:
        normalizeRange in interface GridIndex
        Parameters:
        minValue - describes the minimum of a range in a single dimension used to determine the DGGS coordinate range
        maxValue - describes the maximum of a range in a single dimension used to determine the DGGS coordinate range
        dimension - the dimension
        Returns:
        the range of coordinates as an array where the first element is the min and the second element is the max
